title: State Merit Scholarship
description: For high-achieving students from all states
eligibility: Students with 90% or above in 12th grade
applicationProcess: Submit transcripts, personal statement, and two recommendation letters

title: STEM Excellence Scholarship
applicationProcess: Provide proof of enrollment in a STEM program and submit a project proposal

title: Arts and Humanities Grant
eligibility: Students in arts, literature, or humanities
applicationProcess: Submit a portfolio of work, an essay on creative impact, and one reference letter
